snippet.title: Terra Invicta Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
First trailer for Terra Invicta, an upcoming grand strategy alien invasion game from Pavonis Interactive, the creators of Long War. Contains pre-alpha footage.
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/terrainvicta/terra-invicta?ref=youtube
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1176470/Terra_Invicta/?youtube
Updates on our Discord: https://tinyurl.com/y4gb3f7d
Twitter: https://twitter.com/terra_invicta
Details and dev diaries in the forums at https://www.pavonisinteractive.com.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pavonisinteractive/
